audio_file: Relay the message Patrick Paul Ballester Julita Francisco 649125416044 021125.wav

transcription.text: Ulit si Patrick Ballester po na Credit Max kalingan biyap of Maya Bank po How are you? Anong kungan dyan po ba si Ma'am Shaila?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ano eh? May paso kasi yun eh kaya hindi nakapunta rito.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Shaila May? So nasabihan nyo na rin po ba ma'am si Ma'am Shaila May na tumatawag po ang Credit Max para po sa kanya Maya Bank?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Eh sabi mo wala naman daw siyang ano ron eh. Wala naman daw siyang... Ano ba yung inaanan niya doon? Wala naman daw siyang kinukuha ron. Ano ba ho yun?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Apo regarding lang po ito sa kanya Maya Bank po So pwede po ba ma'am? Pasabihan na lang po ulit na kung pwede po sumagot po sa tawag namin sa number niya po kasi hindi po siya
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: sumasagot May importante lang po kasi kaming sasabihin po regarding sa kanya po ang Maya Bank
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Sabihin nyo na sa akin ako na magsasabi.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: So sa Ma'am pasensya na po hindi po kasi pwede kami mag-disclose regarding sa data po ni ma'am kasi company compliance din po namin yun ma'am pasensya na po So So So So So So So So So So
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: So nababalikan na po kayo ng tawag
transcription.speaker: spk2

translation.tagalog: Ulit si Patrick Ballester po na Credit Max kalingan biyap of Maya Bank po How are you? Anong kungan dyan po ba si Ma'am Shaila?
translation.english: This is Patrick Ballester from Credit Max calling on behalf of Maya Bank. How are you? Is Ma'am Shaila there?

translation.tagalog: Ano eh? May paso kasi yun eh kaya hindi nakapunta rito.
translation.english: She has a fever, so she couldn’t come here.

translation.tagalog: Shaila May? So nasabihan nyo na rin po ba ma'am si Ma'am Shaila May na tumatawag po ang Credit Max para po sa kanya Maya Bank?
translation.english: Shaila May? So have you informed Ma'am Shaila May that Credit Max is calling regarding her Maya Bank account?
What did she tell you, Ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Eh sabi mo wala naman daw siyang ano ron eh. Wala naman daw siyang... Ano ba yung inaanan niya doon? Wala naman daw siyang kinukuha ron. Ano ba ho yun?
translation.english: She said she didn’t have anything to do with it. She’s not taking anything from there. What is this all about?

translation.tagalog: Apo regarding lang po ito sa kanya Maya Bank po So pwede po ba ma'am? Pasabihan na lang po ulit na kung pwede po sumagot po sa tawag namin sa number niya po kasi hindi po siya
translation.english: This is just regarding her Maya Bank. So Ma'am, could you please remind her again to answer our calls on her number, because she hasn't been...

translation.tagalog: sumasagot May importante lang po kasi kaming sasabihin po regarding sa kanya po ang Maya Bank
translation.english: ...answering. We just have something important to tell her regarding her Maya Bank account.

translation.tagalog: Sabihin nyo na sa akin ako na magsasabi.
translation.english: Just tell me and I’ll be the one to inform her.

translation.tagalog: So sa Ma'am pasensya na po hindi po kasi pwede kami mag-disclose regarding sa data po ni ma'am kasi company compliance din po namin yun ma'am pasensya na po So So So So So So So So So So
translation.english: Sorry Ma'am, but we’re not allowed to disclose information regarding Ma'am’s data due to company compliance. Sorry again, Ma'am.

translation.tagalog: So nababalikan na po kayo ng tawag
translation.english: So she’ll be getting a call back.
